title: Silver service: Hotels are changing for senior citizens. Here's what they have to offer
description: Hotels are increasingly catering to senior citizens, offering personalized services and senior-friendly amenities. With the global population aging, the hospitality industry is adapting to meet the needs of older travelers. Discounts, accessible rooms, and wellness packages are among the offerings aimed at attracting this growing demographic.
